statements: SELECT * FROM DailyWasteIntake WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT date, waste_weight FROM DailyWasteIntake WHERE waste_weight > 100;
SELECT waste_type, COUNT(*) as total_entries FROM DailyWasteIntake GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT composition FROM DailyWasteIntake ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM DailyWasteIntake WHERE waste_weight BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT date, waste_weight FROM DailyWasteIntake WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT waste_type, SUM(waste_weight) AS total_waste_weight FROM DailyWasteIntake GROUP BY waste_type HAVING total_waste_weight > 100;
SELECT * FROM DailyWasteIntake WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY waste_weight ASC;
SELECT composition, COUNT(*) AS waste_count FROM DailyWasteIntake GROUP BY composition ORDER BY waste_count DESC;
SELECT AVG(waste_weight) AS average_weight, MAX(waste_weight) AS max_weight, MIN(waste_weight) AS min_weight FROM DailyWasteIntake;
SELECT * FROM daily_waste_intake;
SELECT id, date, waste_type FROM daily_waste_intake ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, quantity FROM daily_waste_intake WHERE waste_type='Plastic';
SELECT waste_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM daily_waste_intake GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT * FROM waste_composition ORDER BY impact_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM daily_waste_intake WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT waste_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM daily_waste_intake GROUP BY waste_type HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT id, composition FROM waste_composition WHERE impact_rating > 3 ORDER BY impact_rating ASC;
SELECT date, waste_type, quantity FROM daily_waste_intake WHERE waste_type = 'Glass' AND quantity >= 10 ORDER BY date ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_composition ORDER BY composition;
SELECT * FROM waste_intake
SELECT waste_type, weight, date FROM waste_intake ORDER BY weight DESC
SELECT composition_name FROM waste_composition
SELECT * FROM waste_categorization WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic'
SELECT categorization_id, waste_type, composition_name FROM waste_categorization JOIN waste_composition ON waste_categorization.composition_id = waste_composition.composition_id
SELECT * FROM waste_intake WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT waste_type, SUM(weight) FROM waste_intake GROUP BY waste_type
SELECT * FROM waste_categorization WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic'
SELECT * FROM waste_intake WHERE weight BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY weight ASC
SELECT waste_composition.composition_name, waste_categorization.waste_type FROM waste_composition JOIN waste_categorization ON waste_composition.composition_id = waste_categorization.composition_id
SELECT * FROM daily_waste_intake;
SELECT date, organic_waste, plastic_waste FROM daily_waste_intake ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, landfill_waste FROM daily_waste_intake WHERE landfill_waste > 100;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM composition_categories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT rw.record_id, rw.date, cc.category_name, rw.weight FROM waste_intake_records rw JOIN composition_categories cc ON rw.category_id = cc.category_id;
SELECT * FROM daily_waste_intake ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT category_name, weight FROM composition_categories c INNER JOIN waste_intake_records w ON c.category_id = w.category_id WHERE w.weight > 100;
SELECT * FROM waste_intake_records WHERE date > '2021-01-01' AND weight BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY weight DESC, date ASC;
SELECT assessment_id, impact_score, assessment_date FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE impact_score >= 8;
SELECT date, organic_waste + plastic_waste + paper_waste + landfill_waste AS total_waste FROM daily_waste_intake WHERE date >= '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM daily_waste_intake;
SELECT waste_id, date, quantity, location FROM daily_waste_intake;
SELECT * FROM waste_composition WHERE composition_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT impact_id, impact_type, severity FROM environmental_impact ORDER BY impact_type DESC;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM waste_category WHERE category_name LIKE '%metal%';
SELECT * FROM daily_waste_intake ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT composition_type, composition_percentage FROM waste_composition WHERE composition_percentage > 0.5 ORDER BY composition_percentage DESC
SELECT impact_type, severity FROM environmental_impact WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY impact_type
SELECT category_name FROM waste_category WHERE category_name LIKE '%Plastic%'
SELECT * FROM impact_assessment ORDER BY assessment_date
